channel.title: Personal Life on Renji
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Life on Renji

item.title: This is Auckland
item.description: 《Pretend It’s a City》里，Martin问Fran为什么人们来纽约。Fran说：This is New York. 要问我为什么来奥克兰，我也会说： This is Auckland.

item.title: Review for 2021
item.description: When you close your eyes, what do you see for 2021? What I am seeing: bleach smelling in the lab, first date with my girlfriend, three-month lockdown and the recent Xmas trip.
